summary: Warner Bros. Entertainment, often called Warner Bros., is an American film and entertainment company based in Burbank, California. It was started in 1923 by four brothers and has become one of the biggest film studios in the U.S. The company makes movies, animations, TV shows, and video games. It owns famous brands like DC Comics and Looney Tunes, with Bugs Bunny as its mascot. Warner Bros. is now a part of Warner Bros. Discovery.
title: Warner Bros.
